title: Jiminy's Is Fighting Climate Change One Pet Treat At A Time - Forbes
body: Jiminy's Chewy Cricket Treat. Jiminy's 2022. Carlson tells the story of Lauren, a millennial Jiminy's customer who refers to her dog Mordecai as "her son."

title: Jiminy's Cricket Treats Review - 2020 | The Strategist - New York Magazine
body: My dog Uli, and two other Strategist staffers' dogs, fell in love with Jiminy's Cricket Treats for dogs. The treats, made with actual cricket protein, are high in protein and better for the ...
